title: Is there anyone noticed a huge price increase in Riot Piont?
body:
Hi everyone, I was excited when the new IG skin set released yesterday, so I wanna purchase more RP to get all those contents. However, the big increase in RP price made me really disappointed. I spent NZ$100 that give me 13800 RP two months ago, but we can only get 10500 for every 100 bucks. What it means here is a 31.4% price increase of RP. OMG! I really don't know when the priced changed like this, it just lowers my incentives to give my money to RIOT. What you guys think actually?
https://i.imgur.com/RFq3gMh.png
https://i.imgur.com/CtXELFg.png
